Title: The Pit
Writer: Carlton Cuse (developed for television by), Kerry Ehrin (developed for television by), Anthony Cipriano (developed for television by), Bill Balas, Robert Bloch (based on characters from the novel 'Psycho' by)
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: Romero confronts Norma about newly learned information; Caleb and Dylan take a risky job.
